Sentencas: SUS430 (16% similar to 17% (mass fraction) Cr) can be used as interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) that operate at lower temperatures ( < 800 degrees C).
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: However, oxidation of steel can occur readily at elevated temperatures leading to the formation of Cr2O3 and spinel (Fe3O4) and thus greatly degrades the performance of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The aim of this work was to reduce oxide growth, in particular, the Cr2O3 phase, through the application of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (LSM20) and La0.8Sr0.2FeO3-delta (LSF20) coatings by atmospheric plasma spraying technology (APS).
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: Oxide growth was characterized by using X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) with an energy dispersive X-ray (EDX) analyzer.
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: During oxidation of fifty 20 h cycles at 800 degrees C in air, the samples with coatings remained very stable, whereas significant spallation and weight loss were observed for the uncoated steel.
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: LSF20 presents apparently advantages in reducing oxidation growth, interface resistance and inhibition of diffusion of chromium.
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: After exposure in air at 800 degrees C for 1000 h, the interfacial resistance of LSF20-coated alloy is lowered by more than 23 times to that of LSM20-coated layer.
Titulo: Effects of La0.8Sr0.2Mn(Fe)O3-δ protective coatings on SOFC metallic interconnects
